mapper.sql: id, username, password, status, desc, create_time, update_time
mapper.insert: insert into user (id, username, password, status, desc, create_time, update_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{desc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into user
id,
username,
password,
status,
desc,
create_time,
update_time,

mapper.update:
update user
username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
desc = #{desc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update user set username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, desc = #{desc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, username, password, status, `desc`, create_time, update_time from user
